card.location.condition.except{0}: List of Card Decks (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Discard Pile, Draw Pile'
card.location.condition.if{0}: List of Card Decks (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Discard Pile, Draw Pile'
card.location.condition.list{0}: List of Card Decks (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Discard Pile, Draw Pile'
card.slot.condition.except{0}: List of Card Slots (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Advanced, Basic'
card.slot.condition.if{0}: List of Card Slots (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Advanced, Basic'
card.slot.condition.list{0}: List of Card Slots (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Advanced, Basic'
card.type.condition.except{0}: List of Card Types (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Spell, Relic, Action'
card.type.condition.if{0}: List of Card Types (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Spell, Relic, Action'
card.type.condition.list{0}: List of Card Types (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Spell, Relic, Action'
